data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during FAVORITE cruise from Port Egmont to Bretts Harbour started at 1769-10-01
Ship: Favorite (Sloop), Voyage: Port Egmont - Bretts Harbour, 1st Observer: William Maltby (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 16G 360BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
